title: Apostle

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your Attack Value, Defense Value and mechanics vary depending on the Moon:
-Under no moon, you have Basic Attack and Basic Defense
-Under a Full Moon, you have Powerful Attack, Basic Defense and you rampage.
-Under a Blood Moon, you have Unstoppable Attack and Powerful Defense, you rampage, and you will clean everyone that you killed.

desc:
Post 1698
*Wadanohara and the Great Blue Sea real!!!!!!!!*
